comments:
Steps to reproduce:
- Install Eclipse 3.0.1 SDK.
- Select Help > Software Updates > Find and Install...
- In that wizard, choose Search for updates of currently installed features
- Select Eclipse 3.0.2 on next page
- After download, select Yes to restart Eclipse.
- Now in Eclipse 3.0.2, select Help > Software Updates > Manage Configuration...
- Select Eclipse 3.0.2 and choose Replace with Another Version and select 3.0.1.
- After revert, select Yes to restart Eclipse.
- Now look into error log Help > About Eclipse Platform > Configuration Details
> View Error log

You'll see the following error:
!SESSION Apr 13, 2005 11:22:44.438 ---------------------------------------------
eclipse.buildId=M200409161125
java.version=1.5.0_02
java.vendor=Sun Microsystems Inc.
BootLoader constants: OS=win32, ARCH=x86, WS=win32, NL=en_US

!STACK 0

Note that I don't see any functional deficiencies because of this error. 
Therefore the severity of this is trivial.
